desc: Pre made rigs, tackle, flasher rigs, lures and Skutes to use while fishing for snapper, reef species and much more. Hand made in Australia using local suppliers we pride ourselves in providing the best service and product on the market and better priced tackle at the same time.

layout.text: Welcome to SCS, proudly running live inventory at cheaper prices for better products.
For all pre order/custom requests please message us directly to discuss lead times and discounbted costs.
